name: Macho Macho Gym
description:
WOW! THIS GAME WILL BREAK YOUR NUTS!
Only for real men who loves to workout. In space. You need to collect protein bars and avoid other guys. They're nasty, they will try to touch you. But you're a true man! Hey! Workout! Workout more!
You can workout by pressing arrows. To start game or restart press Space Bar or Enter.
Good luck. boy. It's a path to become a real man.

Programming and music by Stanislaw Mnizhek.
Art by Julia Mnizhek.

Game inspired by eternal glorius hit "Macho Gym" by our lord and saviour Legowelt.
